function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Changes in apartment design may not effectively mitigate the spread of contagious diseases, leading to increased transmission risk.","Impact":"Higher risk of disease transmission within apartment buildings and residential areas.","Mitigation":"Implementing design changes that facilitate better ventilation and air circulation, as well as incorporating materials and surfaces that are easy to clean and disinfect.","Technologies":"Air filtration systems, antimicrobial surface materials, and touchless fixtures.","People":"Residents in apartment buildings, tenants, and visitors.","Owner":"Architects, property developers, and building owners."},{"Description":"Inadequate circadian regulation due to poor design of bedrooms, leading to negative impacts on sleep quality and overall health.","Impact":"Decreased sleep quality, disrupted circadian rhythms, and potential negative effects on mental and physical health.","Mitigation":"Incorporating designs that maximize natural daylight exposure, provide options for cross ventilation, and support thermal comfort in bedrooms.","Technologies":"Daylight simulation software, smart windows, and intelligent ventilation systems.","People":"Residents, occupants, and building occupants.","Owner":"Architects, interior designers, and property managers."}]}
